krpano.title: Virtual Tour
krpano.action: set(layer[map].onclick, closemap(); ); layer[map].changeorigin(center,center); set(bigscale,0.75); if(layer[map].imagewidth GT stagewidth, div(bigscale, stagewidth, layer[map].imagewidth); ); tween(layer[map].x, 0); tween(layer[map].y, 0); tween(layer[map].scale, get(bigscale));
